content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal Mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) that requires iron-plate and iron-gear-wheel as inputs.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
